title: Baasha Paarusad Version Lyrics Baasha
stanzas:
Baasha Paaru
baasha paaru
paal vadiyum mugatha paaru
pasuva pola gunatha paaru
pachcha raththam ozhugum podhu
pachcha kuzhandha sirippu paaru

peice piece-a kizhikkum podhu
yaesu pola poruma paaru
dhegamellaam vaegum podhum
kodi kodukkum vizhuthu paaradaa

ivan jaathagatha
maaththi vachcha
paavi yaaradaa
